atk-s0402a12:1_5: Āmisadānanti cattāro paccayā diyyanakavasena āmisadānaṁ nāma.
atk-s0402a12:2_0: 143. Dutiye cattāro paccayā yajanakavasena yāgo nāma dhammopi yajanakavasena yāgoti veditabbo.
atk-s0402a12:6_0: 149. Aṭṭhame catūhi paccayehi saṅgaho āmisasaṅgaho, dhammena saṅgaho dhammasaṅgaho.
atk-s0402a12:7_0: 150. Navame catūhi paccayehi anuggaṇhanaṁ āmisānuggaho, dhammena anuggaṇhanaṁ dhammānuggaho.
atk-s0402a12:8_0: 151. Dasame catūhi paccayehi anukampanaṁ āmisānukampā, dhammena anukampanaṁ dhammānukampāti.
